name: nvidia-gpu-monitor
description: Helps to monitor Nvidia GPU utilization using nvidia-smi

scripts.test:coverage: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --print both -- --opts tests/mocha.opts -R spec ./tests
scripts.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --opts tests/mocha.opts -R spec ./tests/Unit && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
